name: Polar Opposites (Goldblaze)
description:
Polar Opposites is a submission by Sheffield Hallam University Students for the Global Game Jam 2022. 

Find your way through the factory zone by manipulating the power of magnetism! Push and pull metallic objects to solve puzzles and work your way through the environment.

Prop flying included.

============================
